name: Destroy Them Aliens!
description:
Note: Please allow 3-5 minutes for this game to load in your browser.

Note The Second: Google Chrome doesn't do so hot when playing in-browser games. Try another browser - such as Firefox - for optimal results.

Description: Destroy Them Aliens is a 'Galaga' clone I made using Unity 5. The concept is pretty simple - you control a spaceship and have to survive 21 waves of enemy and environmental attacks. The controls are intuitive - 'A' or 'D' make the ship go left or right, the 'spacebar' fires a laser and holding the 'left shift' key makes the ship twice as fast. Give it a try, it's fun!
